name: 4gamer.net
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("4gamer.net") {

  .ad_top,
  .hot_game_now,
  .specials_onlinegame,
  .satellite_banner,
  .contents_header,
  .topics,
  .rectangle,
  .ad_premium,
  .contents_bottom_pr,
  .right_contents,
  .userreview_top,
  .logojack_button,
  .pr_sub,
  .finding_common ul > li:nth-child(n+3),
  
  #MEDIANEWS_box,
  .whats_new,
  
  .header,
  .footer_index,
  .last_update
  
  {display: none!important;}
  
  body,
  .contents,
  .left_contents .left_menu .left_menu_top
  
  {background-image: none!important;}
  
  .contents,
  .unit_contents,
  .V2_global_navi,
  .class1,
  .class2,
  div[class*="footer"]
  
  {width: 786px!important;}
  
  .V2_global_navi .class1 a
  {padding: 0 10px!important;}

}
